languages.text: Соломон Антар, разжалованный в патрульные, нес службу на нижних уровнях Даргонуса. Убогий участок, выделенный бывшему арбитру, вскоре стал едва ли не безопаснее дворца Даргонуса — это вызвало зависть других блюстителей и стало смертным приговором Соломону. Загнанный в угол преступной бандой, он запросил поддержку, но никто не пришел на помощь.

After being demoted to the status of a patrolman, Solomorne Anthar took up duty on the lower levels of Dargonus. The shabby precinct the former Arbitrator was assigned to soon rivalled the von Valancius palace in safety, drawing the envy of the enforcers and ultimately signing his death warrant. One fateful day, finding himself cornered by a gang of criminals, Solomorne requested backup, but no one came to his aid.
languages.original_text: Соломон Антар, разжалованный в патрульные, нес службу на нижних уровнях Даргонуса. Убогий участок, выделенный бывшему арбитру, вскоре стал едва ли не безопаснее дворца Даргонуса — это вызвало зависть других блюстителей и стало смертным приговором Соломону. Загнанный в угол преступной бандой, он запросил поддержку, но никто не пришел на помощь.

traits.locale_text: Demoted to a patrolman, Solomorne Anthar took up duty on Dargonus's lower levels. The shabby precinct the former Arbitrator was assigned to would soon rival the Dargonus Palace in safety, causing envy among other enforcers and thus signing Solomorne's death warrant. Cornered by a gang of criminals, he requested backup, but no one came to his aid.

Cornered by a gang of criminals, he requested backup, but no one came to his aid.

One fateful day, finding himself cornered by a gang of criminals, Solomorne requested backup, but no one came to his aid.

The shabby precinct the former Arbitrator was assigned to soon rivalled the Dargonus Palace in safety, drawing the envy of the enforcers and ultimately signing his death warrant. One fateful day, finding himself cornered by a gang of criminals, Solomorne requested backup, but no one came to his aid.

After being demoted to the status of a patrolman, Solomorne Anthar took up duty on the lower levels of Dargonus. The shabby precinct the former Arbitrator was assigned to soon rivalled the von Valancius palace in safety, drawing the envy of the enforcers and ultimately signing his death warrant. One fateful day, finding himself cornered by a gang of criminals, Solomorne requested backup, but no one came to his aid.

languages.text: Nachdem er zum Patrouillendienst degradiert worden war, trat Solomorne Anthar seinen Dienst auf den unteren Ebenen von Dargonus an. Das schäbige Viertel, dem der frühere Arbitrator zugeteilt wurde, war bald fast genau so sicher wie der Palast derer zu Valancius, was den Neid der Enforcers heraufbeschwor und letztlich sein Todesurteil bedeutete. Eines schicksalhaften Tages wurde Solomorne von einer Bande Verbrecher in die Enge getrieben, und als er Verstärkung anforderte, kam ihm niemand zu Hilfe.
languages.original_text: After being demoted to the status of a patrolman, Solomorne Anthar took up duty on the lower levels of Dargonus. The shabby precinct the former Arbitrator was assigned to soon rivalled the von Valancius palace in safety, drawing the envy of the enforcers and ultimately signing his death warrant. One fateful day, finding himself cornered by a gang of criminals, Solomorne requested backup, but no one came to his aid.

traits.locale_text: Nachdem er zum Patrouillendienst degradiert worden war, trat Solomorne Anthar seinen Dienst auf den unteren Ebenen von Dargonus an. Das schäbige Viertel, dem der frühere Arbitrator zugeteilt wurde, war bald fast genau so sicher wie der Palast derer zu Valancius, was den Neid der Enforcers heraufbeschwor und letztlich sein Todesurteil bedeutete. Eines schicksalhaften Tages wurde Solomorne von einer Bande Verbrecher in die Enge getrieben, und als er Verstärkung anforderte, kam ihm niemand zu Hilfe.

languages.text: Rétrogradé au rang de simple patrouilleur, Solomorne Anthar prit ses fonctions dans les bas quartiers de Dargonus. La circonscription à laquelle l'ancien arbitrator fut affecté n'eut bientôt rien à envier au palais von Valancius en termes de sécurité, suscitant la jalousie des prévôts et signant finalement son arrêt de mort. Un jour fatidique, alors qu'il faisait face à une bande de criminels, Solomorne demanda des renforts qui ne vinrent jamais.
languages.original_text: After being demoted to the status of a patrolman, Solomorne Anthar took up duty on the lower levels of Dargonus. The shabby precinct the former Arbitrator was assigned to soon rivalled the von Valancius palace in safety, drawing the envy of the enforcers and ultimately signing his death warrant. One fateful day, finding himself cornered by a gang of criminals, Solomorne requested backup, but no one came to his aid.

traits.locale_text: Rétrogradé au rang de simple patrouilleur, Solomorne Anthar prit ses fonctions dans les bas quartiers de Dargonus. La circonscription à laquelle l'ancien arbitrator fut affecté n'eut bientôt rien à envier au palais von Valancius en termes de sécurité, suscitant la jalousie des prévôts et signant finalement son arrêt de mort. Un jour fatidique, alors qu'il faisait face à une bande de criminels, Solomorne demanda des renforts qui ne vinrent jamais.

languages.text: 索罗蒙·安萨被降职为巡逻人员，开始在达戈努斯底层工作。这位前任法务官被分配到了一片破旧的贫民窟里，而没过多久，在他的努力下，那片区域的治安情况就得到了大大改善，甚至能与冯·瓦兰修斯宫殿媲美。许多执法者嫉妒他的才能，最终决定将他铲除。当生命的最后一天来临时，索罗蒙被一群罪犯逼得走投无路，他请求增援，但没有任何人出手相救。
languages.original_text: After being demoted to the status of a patrolman, Solomorne Anthar took up duty on the lower levels of Dargonus. The shabby precinct the former Arbitrator was assigned to soon rivalled the von Valancius palace in safety, drawing the envy of the enforcers and ultimately signing his death warrant. One fateful day, finding himself cornered by a gang of criminals, Solomorne requested backup, but no one came to his aid.

traits.locale_text: 索罗蒙·安萨被降职为巡逻人员，开始在达戈努斯底层工作。这位前任法务官被分配到了一片破旧的贫民窟里，而没过多久，在他的努力下，那片区域的治安情况就得到了大大改善，甚至能与达戈努斯宫殿媲美。许多执法者嫉妒他的才能，最终决定将他铲除。当生命的最后一天来临时，索罗蒙被一群罪犯逼得走投无路，他请求增援，但没有任何人出手相救。
索罗蒙·安萨被降职为巡逻人员，开始在达戈努斯底层工作。这位前任法务官被分配到了一片破旧的贫民窟里，而没过多久，在他的努力下，那片区域的治安情况就得到了大大改善，甚至能与达戈努斯宫殿媲美。许多执法者嫉妒他的才能，最终决定将他铲除。当生命的最后一天来临时，索罗蒙被一群罪犯逼得走投无路，他请求增援，但没有任何人出手相救。

languages.text: Degradado a un puesto de patrulla, Solomorne Anthar cumplió con su deber en los niveles inferiores de Dargonus. El precinto andrajoso al que quedó asignado el antiguo Arbitrator pronto rivalizó en seguridad con el mismo palacio von Valancius, lo que despertó la envidia de los guardias y acabó firmando su sentencia de muerte. Un día fatídico, acorralado por una banda de criminales, Solomorne solicitó refuerzos, pero nadie acudió en su ayuda.
languages.original_text: After being demoted to the status of a patrolman, Solomorne Anthar took up duty on the lower levels of Dargonus. The shabby precinct the former Arbitrator was assigned to soon rivalled the von Valancius palace in safety, drawing the envy of the enforcers and ultimately signing his death warrant. One fateful day, finding himself cornered by a gang of criminals, Solomorne requested backup, but no one came to his aid.

traits.locale_text: Degradado a un puesto de patrulla, Solomorne Anthar cumplió con su deber en los niveles inferiores de Dargonus. El precinto andrajoso al que quedó asignado el antiguo Arbitrator pronto rivalizó en seguridad con el mismo palacio von Valancius, lo que despertó la envidia de los guardias y acabó firmando su sentencia de muerte. Un día fatídico, acorralado por una banda de criminales, Solomorne solicitó refuerzos, pero nadie acudió en su ayuda.

languages.text: ソロモーン・アンサールは降格処分を受け、ダルゴナスの下層区域でパトロール警官としての任務に就いた。かつてアービトレイターだった彼に割り当てられたみすぼらしい管区は、やがてフォン・ヴァランシウス宮殿に匹敵するほどの安全性を誇るようになった。彼は他の執行官たちの嫉妬を買い、死刑宣告とも言える運命を招くこととなった。ある運命の日に、ソロモーンは犯罪者の一団に追い詰められ、援護を要請したが、誰一人として彼の元に駆けつける者はいなかった。
languages.original_text: After being demoted to the status of a patrolman, Solomorne Anthar took up duty on the lower levels of Dargonus. The shabby precinct the former Arbitrator was assigned to soon rivalled the von Valancius palace in safety, drawing the envy of the enforcers and ultimately signing his death warrant. One fateful day, finding himself cornered by a gang of criminals, Solomorne requested backup, but no one came to his aid.

traits.locale_text: ソロモーン・アンサールは降格処分を受け、ダルゴナスの下層区域でパトロール警官としての任務に就いた。かつてアービトレイターだった彼に割り当てられたみすぼらしい管区は、やがてフォン・ヴァランシウス宮殿に匹敵するほどの安全性を誇るようになった。彼は他の執行官たちの嫉妬を買い、死刑宣告とも言える運命を招くこととなった。ある運命の日に、ソロモーンは犯罪者の一団に追い詰められ、援護を要請したが、誰一人として彼の元に駆けつける者はいなかった。

languages.text: Devriye mertebesine düşürülen Solomorne Anthar, Dargonus'un alt seviyelerinde göreve başladı. Eski Yargıcı'nın atandığı köhne karakol, çok geçmeden güvenlik açısından von Valancius sarayıyla aşık atacak hâle geldi. Bu duruma tanık olan diğer infazcılar, kıskançlıklarından kudurmaya başladı. Yargıcı, nihayetinde ölüm fermanını imzalamıştı. Kaderin cilvesi midir bilinmez fakat bir gün Solomorne, bir suçlu çetesi tarafından köşeye sıkıştırıldı. Takviye istedi ancak bir kişi bile yardımına gelmedi.
languages.original_text: After being demoted to the status of a patrolman, Solomorne Anthar took up duty on the lower levels of Dargonus. The shabby precinct the former Arbitrator was assigned to soon rivalled the von Valancius palace in safety, drawing the envy of the enforcers and ultimately signing his death warrant. One fateful day, finding himself cornered by a gang of criminals, Solomorne requested backup, but no one came to his aid.

Eski Yargıcı'nın atandığı köhne karakol, çok geçmeden güvenlik açısından von Valancius sarayıyla aşık atacak hâle geldi. Bu duruma tanık olan diğer infazcılar kıskançlıklarından kudurmaya başladı. Yargıcı, nihayetinde ölüm fermanını imzalamıştı. Kaderin cilvesi midir bilinmez fakat bir gün Solomorne bir suçlu çetesi tarafından köşeye sıkıştırıldı. Takviye istedi ancak bir kişi bile yardımına gelmedi.
